snippets.name: Create Client
Start Client
snippets.content:
await client.StartAsync();
Console.WriteLine($"State: {client.State}");

snippets.name: Ping
snippets.content:
var pong = await client.PingAsync("hello from demo!");
Console.WriteLine($"Reply: {pong.Message}");

snippets.name: Get Status
snippets.content:
var status = await client.GetStatusAsync();
Console.WriteLine($"Version: {status.Version}");

snippets.name: Auth Status
snippets.content:
var auth = await client.GetAuthStatusAsync();
Console.WriteLine($"Authenticated: {auth.IsAuthenticated}");

snippets.name: List Models
Stop & Dispose
snippets.content:
await client.StopAsync();
await client.DisposeAsync();

snippets.name: Create Session
snippets.content:
var session = await client.CreateSessionAsync(new SessionConfig { Model = "gpt-4o" });
Console.WriteLine($"Session: {session.SessionId}");

snippets.name: SendAndWait
Event Subscribe
Resume Session
System Message
Streaming
Define Tool
snippets.content:
[Description("Encrypts a string by converting to uppercase")]
static string EncryptString(
    [Description("String to encrypt")] string input)
    => input.ToUpperInvariant();

snippets.name: Register Tool
Multiple Tools
snippets.content:
Tools =
[
    AIFunctionFactory.Create(EncryptString, "encrypt_string"),
    AIFunctionFactory.Create(GetWeather, "get_weather"),
    AIFunctionFactory.Create(GetTime, "get_time"),
]

snippets.name: Complex Types
snippets.content:
record DbQueryOptions(string Table, int[] Ids, bool SortAscending);
record City(int CountryId, string CityName, int Population);

snippets.name: Weather Tool
JsonContext
snippets.content:
[JsonSourceGenerationOptions(JsonSerializerDefaults.Web)]
[JsonSerializable(typeof(DbQueryOptions))]
[JsonSerializable(typeof(City[]))]
partial class DemoJsonContext : JsonSerializerContext;
